body_html:
Same problem here with tensorflow 0.7.1 on Ubuntu 15.10
Python 2.7.10 and 2 Titan X cards
Mxnet 0.5 works fine so it's probably not a problem with cuda(7.5) or cudnn(v4)

the symptom can be reproduced easily with the simple example

$ python

import tensorflow as tf
hello = tf.constant('Hello, TensorFlow!')
sess = tf.Session()
sess.run(hello)
Hello, TensorFlow!
quit()

at this point the console freeze.

body:
Same problem here with tensorflow 0.7.1 on Ubuntu 15.10 
Python 2.7.10 and 2 Titan X cards 
Mxnet 0.5 works fine so it's probably not a problem with cuda(7.5) or cudnn(v4)

the symptom can be reproduced easily with the simple example 

$ python

> > > import tensorflow as tf
> > > hello = tf.constant('Hello, TensorFlow!')
> > > sess = tf.Session()
> > > sess.run(hello)
> > > Hello, TensorFlow!
> > > quit()

at this point the console freeze.
